snippet: Comptroller Thomas P. DiNapoli, who is the trustee of the New York State pension fund, a major holder of Qualcomm stock, expressed worry over the risks of large contributions.
abstract: New York State Comptroller Thomas P DiNapoli, trustee of New York State pension fund, sues Qualcomm in effort to force greater public disclosure of corporate political spending; demands to view internal records of political expenditures by company.
lead_paragraph: Comptroller Thomas P. DiNapoli, who is the trustee of the New York State pension fund, a major holder of Qualcomm stock, expressed worry over the risks of large contributions.

headline.seo: New York Comptroller Sues Qualcomm for Data on Political Giving
headline.main: State Comptroller Sues Qualcomm for Data About Its Political Contributions
headline.print_headline: State Comptroller Sues Qualcomm for Data About Its Political Contributions
